tags: None
review: Excellent Doctor. Dr. Senthil Kumar is very knowledgeable yet is very simple and professional in his approach. He does not prescribe or recommend unwanted treatment unlike most other dentists who will try to make a killing as soon as you sit in the chair by giving them a big list of procedures. His X ray charges are also very reasonable and gives it in a CD. I went to him for a second opinion for one of my friends. Dr. Senthil Kumar's charges are only 70% of what the 1st Dentist quoted. My friend has decided to get treated by Dr. Senthil Kumar even though distance from his residence is a challenge for him. In a nut shell - An honest and reliable Doctor.
